Body:
"""Passing cutoff_time. The indicated column will be used as the cutoff time."""
timeseries = self.timeseries
X = self.X.reset_index()
array = cutoff_window_sequences(X, timeseries, window_size=3, cutoff_time=
    'cutoff')
expected_array = np.array([[[2, 22], [3, 23], [4, 24]], [[14, 34], [15, 35],
    [16, 36]]])
assert_allclose(array, expected_array)
